name: The Work Button
description:
Info

A short clicker game where you rise the rankings in Gugle by pressing "work" and borrowing from Google.

This is a game made for Vim Jam 2, a game jam with a ten-day deadline. I, however, chose to set a personal deadline of 72 hours. 

There is nothing new after reaching CEO.

Dev Info

Developed by LKA using the Unity Game Engine

Art assets were made in Aseprite and sound effects were made in BFXR. 

Known Bugs/Issues:

The promotion notification window UI is a bit wack. The button to close it on the X gets its hitbox raised up on certain resolutions. Fix is to click near the top of the X.

Audio is choppy and a tad bit annoying in certain places. Just mute the tab.

If you get promoted while in the shop menu next upgrade doesn't appear until you go to the work button and back to the shop menu.

The button animation is wacky ngl.
